Package ohos.global.i18n.utils

Class LocalesFallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.global.i18n.utils.LocalesFallback

  • public abstract class LocalesFallback
extends Object
    Provides methods for determining the prioritized order for locale matching.

      • findValidAndSort

        public abstract ArrayList<String> findValidAndSort​(String desireTag,
                                                   List<String> localeTags)
                                            throws LocaleFallBackException
        Filters out the IDs of locales that do not match the current language or writing system, and sorts the remaining locale IDs in prioritized order for locale matching.
        Parameters:
        desireTag - Indicates the ID of the desired locale, such as zh-Hant-CN and en-US.
        localeTags - Indicates a list of IDs of supported locales.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of IDs of locales that match the current language and writing system, in prioritized order for locale matching.
        Throws:
        LocaleFallbackException - Throws this exception if the locale IDs in localeTags are invalid.
        LocaleFallBackException
        Since:
        3
